title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - the ultimate solution for aching feet and discomfort while sitting! This versatile foot stool is designed to provide maximum comfort and relief for your back, lumbar, and knee pain. 

Crafted from high quality foam with a durable fabric cover, this footrest ensures long-lasting support and comfort. The sleek black color adds a touch of sophistication to any workspace or home decor. 

With its adjustable heights, you can customize the footrest to your desired level of comfort. The magic tapes and zipper mechanism make height adjustments a breeze, allowing you to find the perfect position for optimal relaxation. 

Cleaning is a breeze with the removable cover and machine washable fabric. Simply unzip the cover and toss it in the washing machine for a quick and easy clean. 

The non-slip design of the bottom layer ensures that the footrest stays securely in place, even on smooth surfaces. 

Not just limited to the office, this footrest is also suitable for use in your car, home, and even on airplanes. It can be placed under your feet or behind your knees to provide the ultimate support and comfort wherever you go. 

But that's not all! This footrest not only relieves discomfort, but also promotes correct sitting habits. Its ergonomic design encourages proper posture, alleviating strain on your back and promoting a healthier spine. 

Invest in your comfort and well-being with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Say goodbye to aching feet and hello to blissful relaxation. Get yours in black today!

Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work - the ultimate solution for your comfort and well-being! 

Made with high-quality foam and a durable fabric cover, this footrest is designed to provide you with the utmost comfort and support. Its sleek black color adds a touch of elegance to any space. 

With dimensions of 16.9 inches in length, 11.2 inches in width, and 2.0 inches in height, this footrest is perfectly sized to fit under your desk at work or in any other space you desire. The upper layer is 3.7 inches thick, providing an extra layer of cushioning for your feet. 

What sets this footrest apart is its adjustable height feature. With magic tapes and a zipper mechanism, you can easily adjust the height to your preference, ensuring optimal comfort and support for your feet and legs. 

Maintaining the cleanliness of your footrest is a breeze. The cover is removable with a convenient zipper closure, allowing for easy removal and machine washing. 

The non-slip design of the bottom ensures that your footrest stays in place, providing stability and preventing any unwanted movement. 

This versatile footrest is suitable for use in various settings, including the office, car, home, and even on airplanes. It can be positioned under your feet or behind your knees, allowing you to find the perfect angle for maximum comfort. 

Not only does the BlissTrends Foot Rest relieve discomfort, but it also promotes correct sitting habits, helping to alleviate back, lumbar, and knee pain. 

Invest in your comfort and well-being with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to blissful relaxation!
